name: FLLU
tag_list: seoul, digital-marketing, viral-marketing, viral-videos, content-creation, app-development, social-marketing
overview:
Digital Marketing Agency based in Seoul, South Korea.

FLLU is a full service digital marketing agency.

FLLU was first established in 2007 as a blog. It has since grown into other digital channels. It is a company that focuses on digital marketing consulting and platform solutions.

2007 was a special year for the founders of fllu. This was the year the iPhone was introduced to the world. Now, the whole world is going mobile. FLLU understands this.

FLLU’s mission is to to connect Seoul, South Korea with the rest of the world. Currently, there isn’t enough content that can spread out to the world. Language and cultural differences are the main hurdles.

Specialties iOS Applications, Digital Marketing, Viral Marketing, Viral Videos, Social Marketing, Social Media, Location-based Services, Interactive Marketing, Social Commerce, Interactive Advertising, Crowdsourcing, Web Development, Web Design, Blog Management, Content Creation.
